entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a powerful wizard who is troubled by his wand.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: A character who is trying to persuade Voldemort to call off the battle and seek Harry Potter.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: The son of Lucius, whose whereabouts are unknown.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A character who is summoned by Voldemort to perform a service.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: A great thick snake that is suspended in midair and protected by an enchanted space.

relationships.description: Voldemort is searching for Potter, as indicated by his statement 'Before the night is out, Potter will have come to find me.'
Lucius is trying to persuade Voldemort to call off the battle and seek Potter.
Voldemort requests a service from Snape, as indicated by his statement 'I need him. There is a — service — I require from him.'
Voldemort communicates with Nagini, as indicated by his whispered conversation with her.
